# objc_object

**Structure**

Represents an instance of a class.

## Declaration

```swift
struct objc_object
```

## Initializers

- **init(isa:)**

## Instance Properties

- **isa**: A pointer to the class definition of which this object is an instance.

## Instance Data Types

- **objc_super**: Specifies the superclass of an instance.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
